dublin_core.dcvalue: Assessing both stroke patients and their CT scans by using a conventional videoconference system offers an interesting opportunity to improve stroke care in rural areas However until now there have been no studies to suggest whether this method is feasible in routine stroke management
Stroke; a journal of cerebral circulation
Teleneurology to improve stroke care in rural areas: The Telemedicine in Stroke in Swabia (TESS) Project.
